Posts.Content: Jun 11, 2011 12:01PM AprilValerie wrote: Hi Ktab96  May I suggest a wonderful resource for you as you walk this new walk trying to make the best decision.  Please go to SAVIsisters.com where there is a wealth of information.  Click on SAVI Sister Stories to hear from many others who have walked your walk.  If you count down seven in the first column you can read my own story and I am here for you to answer any questions you might have.  Just know you are not alone.  God bless.
Posts.Title: SAVI breast brachytherapy - 5 day ktab96 DebConway
